title: After the Pro, the regular Google Pixel 7 leaks, retaining familiarity
content:
Hot on the heels of the Pixel 7 Pro leak, the vanilla Pixel 7 has now also leaked. Leaked renders give us our first look at the design of what will be the direct successor to the Pixel 6. CAD renders of the Pixel 7 come courtesy of OnLeaks and CARPH, which has a solid

The post After the Pro, the regular Google Pixel 7 leaks, retaining familiarity appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Hot on the heels of the Pixel 7 Pro leak, the vanilla Pixel 7 has now also leaked. Leaked renders give us our first look at the phone's design.
